程序包 control.VideoSquare

类 VideoSquareController

java.lang.Object
control.Controller
control.VideoSquare.VideoSquareController
所有已实现的接口:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
直接已知子类:
VideoManagementController
public class VideoSquareController
extends Controller
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
This class is inherited from Controller
This class mainly focus on the process of opening video player

2021/4/27
版本:
2.0
作者:

      public java.util.ArrayList<Video> generateMap​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String tag) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      return a list of videos satisfies the input conditions.
      参数:
      name - the name of the video
      type - the type of the video
      tag - the tag of the video
      返回:
      void
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • forSearch

      public void forSearch​(java.util.ArrayList<Video> vs)
      set the perfect size of the JPanel according to the amount of videos need to show.
      add the searched videos to the JPanel.
      参数:
      vs - a list of videos which satisfy the search conditions.

    • addButtonListener

      public void addButtonListener​(Video video, javax.swing.JButton button)
      add button action listener to the video button.
      参数:
      video - one of the searched video
      button - the button of the searched video

    • generateButton

      public javax.swing.JPanel generateButton​(int num, Video video)
      Update all components.
      参数:
      num - The serial number of the specific video match the search conditions.
      video - on of the video which satisfies the search condition.
      返回:
      JPanel
